author: Firdaus Amin
comment: The overall design and options are quite decent although I would have liked far more options to customize the experience.   There is a weird bug that does not allow me to change the 24hour format to a 12hour format on my LG G watch. Kinda ticks me off
title: Great App

author: Bogdan Zurac
comment: Amazing watch face. Are you willing to provide an option to have the HH:mm horizontally instead of a vertical orientation? This also ties in with the 2nd question I have: are you going to support Watch face Complications from Android Wear 2.0? If so, switching to a horizontal orientation would actually clear up space on top of the time for 1 or 2 complications. It also provides space under the hour/minutes for the entire date, like for example "Just a Minute" watch face does.

reply.author: NinjaLab
reply.content: Hi, thanks for your review. I am going to support complications for sure! I am not sure to support horizontal orientation, it would change the style of the watch too much.

author: Doug Newton
comment: Love the look, been using it for over a year on my original Moto 360, just upgraded to the second generation now that it's cheap online and got Android wear 2, it really needs a notification count option since wear 2 ruined notifications, please add it!

author: Alan Burrows
comment: Very nice.   Good to find a nice, clean, simple watch face. So many try to do everything, with battery stats, weather, interactions - it's surprisingly difficult to find something like this that tells the time and looks good.

author: Stephen Oiller
comment: Love that you can change font sizes, types and especially the ambient mode colours. Would love the option of displaying a simple battery meter (XX%) whilst the screen was lit if possible.

reply.author: NinjaLab
reply.content: Thanks! It is planned!

title: Brilliant, lots of options.

author: Tonko36_
comment: When i put it as a watch face on my smartwatch it shows me the seconds the date but not the minutes and hours can you help me?

reply.author: NinjaLab
reply.content: Did you try to change the color in your settings on the phone? Contact me at tobia.loschiavo@gmail.com

author: Michael Swanson
comment: Very clean, and I really like that you can change the colors using hex code. Well done!

author: Arik Licholat
comment: Would like to keep the day and date visible in ambient, otherwise I'm happy with the face.

reply.author: NinjaLab
reply.content: Ok, thanks for suggestion, I will try to implement an option in the next release!

author: Paolo Boni
comment: An amazingly good looking app for my watch! Highly recommended

reply.author: NinjaLab
reply.content: Thanks Paolo!

title: Amazing!

comment: It could use some more options as others have mentioned, but overall it's a very good watch face.
title: Awesome!

comment: So good it should be standard :D

reply.author: NinjaLab
reply.content: Thanks!

title: Excellent watch face

author: Robin Hebert
comment: I love the simplicity of it yet it's fun to customize the fonts and colors.
title: Very nice and customizable

author: Wes Anderson
comment: Love the design. Only issue is that in 12 hour mode it still shows 00 for the hour at midnight.

author: Matt Brown
comment: Would be great if the hours and minutes could be side by side. 5 stars if it had that option.
title: Great. Almost Perfect.

comment: I can't launch the app on my phone so I don't have any customisation for my watch

comment: Looks great! The best face I've tried so far!

comment: Can u add Steps count and more fonts please?

comment: I like it a lot

title: Looks brilliant

comment: Love the watch face on my Moto and Zenwatch 2. The battery life is awesome.

title: Loving it

comment: Really good looking

author: Carl Allen
comment: Love the options. Bought it since date was added. Works great. Would be a 5 star if added steps lower left and temp lower right. I do think its a nice addition to the watch.

reply.author: NinjaLab
reply.content: Thanks for the suggestions. I will add steps for sure.

author: imToast
comment: Love my watch even more now.  You can customize colors infinitely, simple date is an added bonus.
title: Awesome

reply.content:
Could you please send a screenshot of the battery stats to tobia.loschiavo@gmail.com

author: Jude Niroshan Abeyeratne
comment: Loved the Sony watch face, so I really adore this take on it. Lovely colours and beautiful animations. Looks great even on circular watches. I'd lengthen the time it stays before going to ambient a bit more though.
title: Simply beautiful!

author: Mike Lewis
comment: I had an old Sony smart watch for years and missed this style watch face. Glad to have that style back!

reply.author: NinjaLab
reply.content: Thanks!

title: Thank you!

comment: Plaease add date option

comment: Option to show date would be a big improvement

reply.content: Just added that! Update rolling out now!

title: Nice watch face

reply.author: NinjaLab
reply.content: Now the date is available! Could you update your review please? :)

title: Great watch face.

author: Matt Brown
comment: Really nice! only two things that could improve it imo: option for date under the time, and an option to move the ticks inward from the outside to better accommodate the moto 360 flat tire.

reply.author: NinjaLab
reply.content: Added date and day of the week!

author: Juste Yan
comment: Served as daily drive, looks awesome with a proper customization.
title: Great.

author: Dustin Smith
comment: I had issues with moto 360, developer fixed issue, now everything is working great! Good customer support!

reply.author: NinjaLab
reply.content: Hi, have you tried one recent version of the face? I think I have fixed the problems with moto.

title: Issues fixed

author: Rikerrious Geter
comment: This app is beautiful, but it completely caused my battery to drain and not charge as noted from a trip to best buy. Will be on the lookout for updates.

reply.author: NinjaLab
reply.content: Hi, today I have released a new version that should fix the drain issue.

title: Drained battery moto 360

author: Daniel Navarro
comment: Digging how well this fills in the square screen on my G Watch, unlike most other watchfaces. Makes excellent use of all available screen real estate. Great job.
title: Clean and smooth

comment: When I go into settings to turn 24 hour clock off, watch doesn't change. If you back out of settings and go back in, 24 hour is turned back on.

reply.content:
Hi, I should have fixed the problem. Can you check that?
